thread.title: New Highs In This Market? These Stocks Defy Sell-Off
thread.title_full: New Highs In This Market? These Stocks Defy Sell-Off

title: New Highs In This Market? These Stocks Defy Sell-Off
text:
Stock Market Sell-Off Ramps Up, But A Few Holdouts Score Gains 
Stocks sank deeper into the red in early afternoon trading as disappointing housing and consumer income data weighed. The Nasdaq slumped 2.4%, the S&P 500 2% and the Dow Jones industrial average 1.5%. Trade had picked up and volume was running higher across the board in the stock market today ... 01:32 PM ET 2 Top Retail Stocks Hit New Highs 
A couple of major retailers made notable new highs Thursday, and not just because of a strong July retail sales report. After making a few fuzzy attempts to clear a flat base, Home Depot (NYSE:HD) jumped decisively, adding 1.33 to 119.02. The stock closed 1% above the 118.09 buy point of the ... 08/13/2015 07:05 PM ET Stocks Hold Modest Gains; GoPro Climbs On Analyst Note 
Stocks held modest gains in afternoon trading Thursday. The Nasdaq posted a 0.4% rise. The composite owed some of its advance to Cisco Systems (NASDAQ:CSCO). The computer networking giant, one of the largest Nasdaq components, gapped up nearly 4% after it beat second-quarter estimates late ... 08/13/2015 02:54 PM ET Carnival Near Buy Point As Leisure Stocks Outperform 
The market's modest rebound Friday produced a similarly modest number of stocks that hit new 52-week highs. The Leisure sector produced the most new highs, paced by cruise line operator Carnival (NYSE:CCL), which gapped up and soared 2.70, or 6%, to 47.12. Volume was heavy as the stock briefly ... 03/27/2015 06:19 PM ET Flower Foods lowers outlook 
The Tastykake and Nature's Own maker's Q2 earnings fell 12.5% to 21 cents a share ex items on lower cake volume, 3 cents below views. Sales slid 2.3% to $877 mil, falling shy of forecasts for $941 mil. Flower Foods (NYSE:FLO) slashed its full-year EPS guidance to 92-98 cents from 98 cents-$1.05. ... 08/12/2014 06:51 PM ET Nike, Foot Locker Break Out In Near Lockstep 
A strong morning rally produced three fresh breakouts Friday in shares of familiar names. Nike (NYSE:NKE) was the most obvious. The big cap reported Q1 results after the close Thursday that beat estimates for earnings and revenue. The stock gapped out of a seven-week cup base that corrected 20% in ... 09/25/2015 02:48 PM ET Activision Blizzard Slips From New High 
Few stocks scored new highs Thursday even though the market pared a large chunk of the day's losses. Activision Blizzard (NASDAQ:ATVI) was one that hit a new milestone. It ended well off its session low, but still slipped 0.13 to 31.49. Intraday, the stock etched a fresh record high by a penny ... 09/24/2015 05:10 PM ET Food, Banking Stocks Hit New Highs 
Thin. That's an appropriate description for the new highs list Wednesday, which was short on stocks and many of the ones that made it were thinly traded. Regional banks continue to account for many of the 52-week price highs. Florida's CenterState Banks (NASDAQ:CSFL) jumped 1%. The stock is rising ... 09/23/2015 04:54 PM ET Stocks At New Highs In Rarefied Air 
Amerco, a truck rentals giant in the moving business, was among a tiny handful of highly rated names that bucked Tuesday's market sell-off and made new highs. The stock rose to a new high of 395.25 before fading. But it still ended the session up 1.28 to 392.58. Volume burst 115% above its 50-day ... 09/22/2015 06:20 PM ET Consumer Sector Leaders Buffalo Wild, Activision Make New Highs 
A pocket of consumer-focused names topped the still slim new highs list on Monday. Buffalo Wild Wings (NASDAQ:BWLD) rose as much as 3%, making a new high of 205.62. The stock ended up 4.18 to 203.90 in light volume. It gained more ground past a 195.93 cup buy point. The 5% chase zone in the ... 09/21/2015 05:35 PM ET
